verses.verse: לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the sons עַמּ֗וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הֲבָנִ֥ים <S%H1121><s%> the sons אֵין֙ <S%H369><s%> have לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Hath Israel אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo יוֹרֵ֖שׁ <S%H3423><s%> inherit אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> no ל֑וֹ מַדּ֗וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> how יָרַ֤שׁ <S%H3423><s%> possession מַלְכָּם֙ <S%H4428><s%> ? why [then] doth their king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גָּ֔ד <S%H1410><s%> Gad וְעַמּ֖וֹ <S%H5971><s%> and his people בְּעָרָ֥יו <S%H5892><s%> Ai יָשָֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> dwell

לָכֵ֡ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore הִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> behold יָמִ֨ים <S%H3117><s%> Therefore behold the days בָּאִ֜ים <S%H935><s%> come נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְ֠הִשְׁמַעְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> to be heard אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> Against רַבַּ֨ת <S%H7237><s%> in Rabbah בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the sons עַמּ֜וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon תְּרוּעַ֣ת <S%H8643><s%> that I will cause an alarm מִלְחָמָ֗ה <S%H4421><s%> of war וְהָֽיְתָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> will become לְתֵ֣ל <S%H8510><s%> heap שְׁמָמָ֔ה <S%H8077><s%> and it shall be a desolate וּבְנֹתֶ֖יהָ <S%H1323><s%> and her daughters בָּאֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire תִּצַּ֑תְנָה <S%H3341><s%> shall be burned וְיָרַ֧שׁ <S%H3423><s%> be heir יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> then shall Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יֹרְשָׁ֖יו <S%H3423><s%> unto them that were his heirs אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

הֵילִ֨ילִי <S%H3213><s%> Howl חֶשְׁבּ֜וֹן <S%H2809><s%> O Heshbon כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for שֻׁדְּדָה־ <S%H7703><s%> is spoiled עַ֗י <S%H5857><s%> for Ai צְעַקְנָה֮ <S%H6817><s%> cry בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> ye daughters רַבָּה֒ <S%H7237><s%> of Rabbah חֲגֹ֣רְנָה <S%H2296><s%> gird שַׂקִּ֔ים <S%H8242><s%> you with sackcloth סְפֹ֕דְנָה <S%H5594><s%> lament וְהִתְשׁוֹטַ֖טְנָה <S%H7751><s%> and run to and fro בַּגְּדֵר֑וֹת <S%H1448><s%> by the hedges כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for מַלְכָּם֙ <S%H4428><s%> for their king בַּגּוֹלָ֣ה <S%H1473><s%> into captivity יֵלֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> will go כֹּהֲנָ֥יו <S%H3548><s%> [and] his priests וְשָׂרָ֖יו <S%H8269><s%> and his princes יַחְדָּֽיו׃ <S%H3162><s%> together

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> How תִּתְהַֽלְלִי֙ <S%H1984><s%> Wherefore gloriest בָּֽעֲמָקִ֔ים <S%H6010><s%> thou in the valleys זָ֣ב <S%H2100><s%> thy flowing עִמְקֵ֔ךְ <S%H6010><s%> valley הַבַּ֖ת <S%H1323><s%> daughter הַשּֽׁוֹבֵבָ֑ה <S%H7728><s%> O backsliding הַבֹּֽטְחָה֙ <S%H982><s%> trusts בְּאֹ֣צְרֹתֶ֔יהָ <S%H214><s%> in her treasures מִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> Who יָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> [saying] Who shall come אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> against

הִנְנִי֩ <S%H2005><s%> I am going מֵבִ֨יא <S%H935><s%> Behold I will bring עָלַ֜יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> and פַּ֗חַד <S%H6343><s%> a fear נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> upon thee saith אֲדֹנָ֧י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֛ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all סְבִיבָ֑יִךְ <S%H5439><s%> from all those that be about וְנִדַּחְתֶּם֙ <S%H5080><s%> thee and ye shall be driven out אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man לְפָנָ֔יו <S%H6440><s%> right forth וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> no מְקַבֵּ֖ץ <S%H6908><s%> and none shall gather up לַנֹּדֵֽד׃ <S%H5074><s%> him that wandereth

וְאַחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> And afterward כֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that אָשִׁ֛יב <S%H7725><s%> I will bring again אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁב֥וּת <S%H7622><s%> the captivity בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַמּ֖וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס

לֶאֱד֗וֹם <S%H123><s%> Concerning Edom כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts הַאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> is there ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer חָכְמָ֖ה <S%H2451><s%> [Is] wisdom בְּתֵימָ֑ן <S%H8487><s%> south אָבְדָ֤ה <S%H6><s%> perished עֵצָה֙ <S%H6098><s%> advice מִבָּנִ֔ים <S%H995><s%> from the prudent נִסְרְחָ֖ה <S%H5628><s%> vanished חָכְמָתָֽם׃ <S%H2451><s%> ? is their wisdom

נֻ֤סוּ <S%H5127><s%> Flee הָפְנוּ֙ <S%H6437><s%> ye turn back הֶעְמִ֣יקוּ <S%H6009><s%> deep לָשֶׁ֔בֶת <S%H3427><s%> dwell יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> O inhabitants דְּדָ֑ן <S%H1719><s%> of Dedan כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֥יד <S%H343><s%> the calamity עֵשָׂ֛ו <S%H6215><s%> of Esau הֵבֵ֥אתִי <S%H935><s%> for I will bring עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> upon עֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> upon him the time פְּקַדְתִּֽיו׃ <S%H6485><s%> [that] I will visit

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If בֹּֽצְרִים֙ <S%H1219><s%> If grapegatherers בָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> come לָ֔ךְ לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יַשְׁאִ֖רוּ <S%H7604><s%> to thee would they not leave עֽוֹלֵל֑וֹת <S%H5955><s%> grapes אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If גַּנָּבִ֥ים <S%H1590><s%> thieves בַּלַּ֖יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> by night הִשְׁחִ֥יתוּ <S%H7843><s%> they will destroy דַיָּֽם׃ <S%H1767><s%> till they have enough

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> but אֲנִ֞י <S%H589><s%> I חָשַׂ֣פְתִּי <S%H2834><s%> bare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵשָׂ֗ו <S%H6215><s%> But I have made Esau גִּלֵּ֙יתִי֙ <S%H1540><s%> I have uncovered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִסְתָּרָ֔יו <S%H4565><s%> his secret places וְנֶחְבָּ֖ה <S%H2247><s%> to hide לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יוּכָ֑ל <S%H3201><s%> and he shall not be able שֻׁדַּ֥ד <S%H7703><s%> is spoiled זַרְע֛וֹ <S%H2233><s%> himself his seed וְאֶחָ֥יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren וּשְׁכֵנָ֖יו <S%H7934><s%> and his neighbours וְאֵינֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H369><s%> is no

עָזְבָ֥ה <S%H5800><s%> Leave יְתֹמֶ֖יךָ <S%H3490><s%> thy fatherless children אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I אֲחַיֶּ֑ה <S%H2421><s%> I will preserve [them] alive וְאַלְמְנֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H490><s%> and let thy widows עָלַ֥י <S%H5921><s%> and תִּבְטָֽחוּ׃ <S%H982><s%> trust ס

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> For thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הִ֠נֵּה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who אֵ֨ין <S%H369><s%> were not מִשְׁפָּטָ֜ם <S%H4941><s%> Behold they whose judgment לִשְׁתּ֤וֹת <S%H8354><s%> [was] not to drink הַכּוֹס֙ <S%H3563><s%> of the cup שָׁת֣וֹ <S%H8354><s%> have assuredly יִשְׁתּ֔וּ <S%H8354><s%> drunken וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> the one נָקֹ֖ה <S%H5352><s%> and [art] thou he [that] shall altogether תִּנָּקֶ֑ה <S%H5352><s%> go unpunished לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תִנָּקֶ֔ה <S%H5352><s%> ? thou shalt not go unpunished כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for שָׁתֹ֖ה <S%H8354><s%> but thou shalt surely תִּשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <S%H8354><s%> drink

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for בִ֤י נִשְׁבַּ֙עְתִּי֙ <S%H7650><s%> For I have sworn נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> by myself saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לְשַׁמָּ֧ה <S%H8047><s%> shall become a desolation לְחֶרְפָּ֛ה <S%H2781><s%> a reproach לְחֹ֥רֶב <S%H2721><s%> a waste וְלִקְלָלָ֖ה <S%H7045><s%> and a curse תִּֽהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> will become בָצְרָ֑ה <S%H1224><s%> that Bozrah וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עָרֶ֥יהָ <S%H5892><s%> and all the cities תִהְיֶ֖ינָה <S%H1961><s%> will become לְחָרְב֥וֹת <S%H2723><s%> wastes עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> thereof shall be perpetual

שְׁמוּעָ֤ה <S%H8052><s%> a rumour שָׁמַ֙עְתִּי֙ <S%H8085><s%> I have heard מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD וְצִ֖יר <S%H6735><s%> and an ambassador בַּגּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> unto the heathen שָׁל֑וּחַ <S%H7971><s%> is sent הִֽתְקַבְּצוּ֙ <S%H6908><s%> [saying] Gather ye together וּבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> and come עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> against וְק֖וּמוּ <S%H6965><s%> against her and rise up לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> to the battle

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold קָטֹ֛ן <S%H6996><s%> thee small נְתַתִּ֖יךָ <S%H5414><s%> For lo I will make בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> among the heathen בָּז֖וּי <S%H959><s%> [and] despised בָּאָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> among men

תִּֽפְלַצְתְּךָ֞ <S%H8606><s%> Thy terribleness הִשִּׁ֤יא <S%H5377><s%> hath deceived אֹתָךְ֙ <S%H853><s%> זְד֣וֹן <S%H2087><s%> thee [and] the pride לִבֶּ֔ךָ <S%H3820><s%> of thine heart שֹֽׁכְנִי֙ <S%H7931><s%> O thou that dwellest בְּחַגְוֵ֣י <S%H2288><s%> in the clefts הַסֶּ֔לַע <S%H5553><s%> of the rock תֹּפְשִׂ֖י <S%H8610><s%> that holdest מְר֣וֹם <S%H4791><s%> the height גִּבְעָ֑ה <S%H1389><s%> of the hill כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Though תַגְבִּ֤יהַ <S%H1361><s%> as high כַּנֶּ֙שֶׁר֙ <S%H5404><s%> as the eagle קִנֶּ֔ךָ <S%H7064><s%> though thou shouldest make thy nest מִשָּׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> there אֽוֹרִידְךָ֖ <S%H3381><s%> I will bring thee down נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> from thence saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וְהָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> will become אֱד֖וֹם <S%H123><s%> Also Edom לְשַׁמָּ֑ה <S%H8047><s%> shall be a desolation כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> everyone עֹבֵ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> every one that goeth עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and יִשֹּׁ֥ם <S%H8074><s%> by it shall be astonished וְיִשְׁרֹ֖ק <S%H8319><s%> and shall hiss עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַכּוֹתֶֽהָ׃ <S%H4347><s%> at all the plagues

כְּֽמַהְפֵּכַ֞ת <S%H4114><s%> As in the overthrow סְדֹ֧ם <S%H5467><s%> of Sodom וַעֲמֹרָ֛ה <S%H6017><s%> and Gomorrah וּשְׁכֵנֶ֖יהָ <S%H7934><s%> and the neighbour אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> [cities] thereof saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יֵשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> shall abide שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> no man וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יָג֥וּר <S%H1481><s%> dwell בָּ֖הּ בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> there neither shall a son אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> of man

הִ֠נֵּה <S%H2009><s%> Behold כְּאַרְיֵ֞ה <S%H738><s%> like a lion יַעֲלֶ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> Behold he shall come up מִגְּא֣וֹן <S%H1347><s%> from the swelling הַיַּרְדֵּן֮ <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against נְוֵ֣ה <S%H5116><s%> against the habitation אֵיתָן֒ <S%H386><s%> of the strong כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> in אַרְגִּ֤יעָה <S%H7280><s%> but I will suddenly אֲרִיצֶ֨נּוּ <S%H7323><s%> make him run away מֵֽעָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and וּמִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> and whoever בָח֖וּר <S%H970><s%> young אֵלֶ֣יהָ <S%H413><s%> over אֶפְקֹ֑ד <S%H6485><s%> [man that] I may appoint כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> who כָמ֙וֹנִי֙ <S%H3644><s%> is like וּמִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> and who יֹעִידֶ֔נִּי <S%H3259><s%> over her? for who [is] like me? and who will appoint me the time וּמִי־ <S%H4310><s%> and who זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> then רֹעֶ֔ה <S%H7462><s%> ? and who [is] that shepherd אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who יַעֲמֹ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> that will stand לְפָנָֽי׃ <S%H6440><s%> before ס

לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore שִׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> Therefore hear עֲצַת־ <S%H6098><s%> the counsel יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which יָעַץ֙ <S%H3289><s%> that he hath taken אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against אֱד֔וֹם <S%H123><s%> against Edom וּמַ֨חְשְׁבוֹתָ֔יו <S%H4284><s%> and his purposes אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which חָשַׁ֖ב <S%H2803><s%> that he hath purposed אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> against the inhabitants תֵימָ֑ן <S%H8487><s%> of Teman אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not יִסְחָבוּם֙ <S%H5498><s%> shall draw them out צְעִירֵ֣י <S%H6810><s%> Surely the least הַצֹּ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> of the flock אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יַשִּׁ֛ים <S%H8074><s%> desolate עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> because נְוֵהֶֽם׃ <S%H5116><s%> surely he shall make their habitations
